6 HandPoseGenerator::HandPoseGenerator()
7 {
8  nh.param<int>("/demo", demo, 0);
9  nh.param<int>("/Number_obj", Number_obj, 5);
10 
11  /*reads geometry information*/
12  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/geometries_topic", geometries_topic_, "/BasicGeometriesNode/geometries");
13  stream_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(geometries_topic_, 1, &HandPoseGenerator::HandPoseGeneratorCallback, this);
14  /*sends obstacle informations*/
15  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_list_left", obstacles_topic_left, "/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_pose_left");
16  obstacles_publisher_left = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray > (obstacles_topic_left.c_str(),1);
17 
18  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_list_right", obstacles_topic_right, "/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_pose_right");
19  obstacles_publisher_right = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray > (obstacles_topic_right.c_str(),1);
20 
21  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/Reject_obstacle_left", Reject_obstalces_topic_left, "/PotentialFieldControl/Reject_obstacle_list_left");
22  Reject_obstacles_publisher_left = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle > (Reject_obstalces_topic_left.c_str(),1);
23 
24  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/Reject_obstacle_right", Reject_obstalces_topic_right, "/PotentialFieldControl/Reject_obstacle_list_right");
25  Reject_obstacles_publisher_right = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle > (Reject_obstalces_topic_right.c_str(),1);
26  /*sends information about the remove or grasp objects */
27  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/objects_info_r", obj_info_topic_r, "/PotentialFieldControl/objects_info_right");
28  objects_info_right_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::UInt16 > (obj_info_topic_r.c_str(),1, this);
29  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/objects_info_l", obj_info_topic_l, "/PotentialFieldControl/objects_info_left");
30  objects_info_left_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::UInt16 > (obj_info_topic_l.c_str(),1, this);
31 
32  /*config parameteres*/
33  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/desired_hand_frame", desired_hand_frame_, "desired_hand_pose");
34  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/base_frame", base_frame_, "vito_anchor");

37

65 void HandPoseGenerator::Start_left(const desperate_housewife::Start::ConstPtr& msg)
66 {
67  std::cout<<"start left"<<std::endl;
68  start_controller_left = msg->start_left ;
69 
70  if(use_both_arm == false)
71  {
72  start_controller_right = msg->start_right;
73  }
74 
75  stop = msg->stop;
76 
77 }

83 
84  if(use_both_arm == false)

86  start_controller_left = msg->start_left;

92 
93 void HandPoseGenerator::HandPoseGeneratorCallback(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
94 {
95 
96  if((start_controller_left != 0) && (start_controller_right != 0))
97  {
98  // CheckRealTimeObstacleMovements(msg);
99  if(stop == 0)
100  {
101  std::cout<<"start controller"<<std::endl;
102  ROS_DEBUG("start controller");
103  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle DesiredHandPose;
104 
105  DesiredHandPose.home = 0;
106  std_msgs::UInt16 Obj_info; /*msg for desperate_mind with object's information*/
107 
108  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray obstaclesMsg;
109 
110  if ( msg->geometries.size() == 1)
111  {
112  DesiredHandPose = generateHandPose( msg->geometries[0], 0 );
113 
114  /*check if is graspable (send hand desired pose) or not (remove object)*/
115  if(DesiredHandPose.isGraspable != true)
116  {
117  ROS_DEBUG("Object to Reject");
118  DesiredHandPose.pose = ObstacleReject(msg->geometries[0] , DesiredHandPose.whichArm);
119  Obj_info.data = 1; /*flag for desperate_mind code.*/
120  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform2;
121  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose.pose, tfHandTrasform2);
122  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform2, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(),"ObstacleReject") );
123 
124  /*send the geometry like obstacle for not touch the obstacle */
125  // obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( SetObstacleMsg(msg->geometries[0]) );
126  obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( msg->geometries[0]);
127  }
128 
129 
130  else
131  {
132  Obj_info.data = 0; /*flag for desperate_mind code.*/
133  ROS_DEBUG("Graspable objects");
134  }
135 
136  if (DesiredHandPose.whichArm == 1) /*left arm*/
137  {
138  desired_hand_publisher_left.publish( DesiredHandPose );
139  objects_info_left_pub.publish(Obj_info);
140  obstacles_publisher_left.publish(obstaclesMsg);
141  stop = 1;
142  }
143 
144  else /*right arm*/
145  {
146  desired_hand_publisher_right.publish( DesiredHandPose );
147  objects_info_right_pub.publish(Obj_info);
148  obstacles_publisher_right.publish(obstaclesMsg);
149  stop = 1;
150  }
151 
152  /*to show with rviz */
153  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform;
154  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose.pose, tfHandTrasform);
155  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(), desired_hand_frame_.c_str()) );
156  }
157  /*if there are more than a user defined number of object */
158  else if (msg->geometries.size() >= (uint) Number_obj )
159  {
160  Overturn();
161  }
162  else
163  {
164  switch(demo)
165  {
166  case 0:
167  DesperateDemo1(msg); /*take graspable object with obstacle avoidance*/
168  break;
169  case 1:
170  DesperateDemo2(msg); /*take graspable object with removing the obstalce */
171  break;
172  case 2:
173  ROS_ERROR("IMPOSSIBLE DEMO.. Demo does not exist");
174  break;
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  /*until the robot doesn't arrived at home stay still.*/
179  else
180  return;
181 
182  }
183 }
184 
185 
186 desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle HandPoseGenerator::generateHandPose( desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle geometry, int cyl_nbr )
187 {
188  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle hand_pose_local;
189  hand_pose_local.obj = 1;
190 
191  if ( isGeometryGraspable ( geometry ))
192  {
193  hand_pose_local.whichArm = whichArm( geometry.pose , cyl_nbr);
194  std::cout<<"^^^^^^^hand_pose_local.whichArm^^^^ : "<<hand_pose_local.whichArm <<std::endl;
195  hand_pose_local.pose = placeHand( geometry, hand_pose_local.whichArm );
196  hand_pose_local.isGraspable = true;
197  }
198  else
199  {
200  hand_pose_local.pose = geometry.pose;
201  hand_pose_local.isGraspable = false;
202  hand_pose_local.whichArm = whichArm( geometry.pose, cyl_nbr );
203  }
204 
205  return hand_pose_local;
206 }
207 
208 bool HandPoseGenerator::isGeometryGraspable ( desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle geometry )
209 {
210  /*comparision between ration and treshold and cylinder radius with another threshold*/
211  if (geometry.info[geometry.info.size() - 1] >=55 && geometry.info[0] < 0.10)
212  {
213  return true;
214  }
215 
216  return false;
217 }
218 
219 
220 
221 void HandPoseGenerator::DesperateDemo1(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
222 {
223  ROS_INFO("***DEMO1, take first graspable object with obstacle avoidance***");
224  std::vector< desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle > objects_vec;
225 
226  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray obstaclesMsg;
227  std_msgs::UInt16 Obj_info;
228 
229  for (unsigned int i=0; i< msg->geometries.size(); i++)
230  {
231  objects_vec.push_back(msg->geometries[i]);
232  }
233 
234  /* sort the cylinder by the shortes distance from softhand */
235  std::sort(objects_vec.begin(), objects_vec.end(), [](desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle first, desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle second) {
236  double distfirst = std::sqrt( first.pose.position.x*first.pose.position.x + first.pose.position.y*first.pose.position.y + first.pose.position.z*first.pose.position.z);
237  double distsecond = std::sqrt( second.pose.position.x*second.pose.position.x + second.pose.position.y*second.pose.position.y + second.pose.position.z*second.pose.position.z);
238  return (distfirst < distsecond); });
239 
240  int obj_grasp = 0;
241 
242  /*find the first graspagle geometry */
243  for(unsigned int k=0; k < objects_vec.size(); k++)
244  {
245  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle DesiredHandPose;
246  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle obstacle;
247 
248  DesiredHandPose = generateHandPose( objects_vec[k], k );
249 
250  if(DesiredHandPose.isGraspable != true)
251  {
252  // obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( SetObstacleMsg(msg->geometries[0]) );
253  obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( msg->geometries[0]);
254  }
255 
256  else
257  {
258  Obj_info.data = 0;
259  obj_grasp = obj_grasp + 1;
260  ROS_DEBUG("Graspable objects");
261 
262  /*send all other cylinders like obstalcle*/
263  for (unsigned int i_ = k + 1; i_ < objects_vec.size(); i_++ )
264  {
265  // obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( SetObstacleMsg(objects_vec[i_]) );
266  obstaclesMsg.geometries.push_back( objects_vec[i_]);
267  }
268 
269  if (DesiredHandPose.whichArm == 1) /*left arm*/
270  {
271  desired_hand_publisher_left.publish( DesiredHandPose );
272  obstacles_publisher_left.publish(obstaclesMsg);
273  objects_info_left_pub.publish(Obj_info);
274  stop = 1;
275  }
276 
277  else /*right arm*/
278  {
279  desired_hand_publisher_right.publish( DesiredHandPose );
280  obstacles_publisher_right.publish(obstaclesMsg);
281  objects_info_right_pub.publish(Obj_info);
282  stop = 1;
283  }
284 
285  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform;
286  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose.pose, tfHandTrasform);
287  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(), desired_hand_frame_.c_str()) );
288 
289  break;
290  }
291  }
292 
293  /*if there aren't graspable object call the funciont overtun */
294  if(obj_grasp == 0)
295  Overturn();
296 }
297 
298 
299 void HandPoseGenerator::DesperateDemo2(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
300 {
301  ROS_INFO("***DEMO2, take first graspable without obstacles avoidance***");
302  std::vector< desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle > objects_vec;
303  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle DesiredHandPose;
304  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle obstacle;
305  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray obstaclesMsg;
306  std_msgs::UInt16 Obj_info;
307 
308  for (unsigned int i=0; i< msg->geometries.size(); i++)
309  {
310  objects_vec.push_back(msg->geometries[i]);
311  }
312  /*sort the cylinder by the shortes distance from softhand */
313  std::sort(objects_vec.begin(), objects_vec.end(), [](desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle first, desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle second) {
314  double distfirst = std::sqrt( first.pose.position.x*first.pose.position.x + first.pose.position.y*first.pose.position.y + first.pose.position.z*first.pose.position.z);
315  double distsecond = std::sqrt( second.pose.position.x*second.pose.position.x + second.pose.position.y*second.pose.position.y + second.pose.position.z*second.pose.position.z);
316  return (distfirst < distsecond); });
317 
318  for(unsigned int k=0; k < objects_vec.size(); k++)
319  {
320  DesiredHandPose = generateHandPose( objects_vec[k], k );
321 
322  if (!DesiredHandPose.isGraspable )
323  {
324  ROS_DEBUG("Object to Reject");
325  DesiredHandPose.pose = ObstacleReject(objects_vec[k], DesiredHandPose.whichArm);
326  Obj_info.data = 1;
327  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform2;
328  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose.pose, tfHandTrasform2);
329  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform2, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(),"ObstacleReject") );
330  }
331 
332  else
333  {
334  ROS_DEBUG("Graspable objects");
335  Obj_info.data = 0; /*flag to grasp object in the desperate_mind code*/
336  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform;
337  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose.pose, tfHandTrasform);
338  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(), desired_hand_frame_.c_str()) );
339  }
340 
341  if (DesiredHandPose.whichArm == 1)
342  {
343  desired_hand_publisher_left.publish(DesiredHandPose);
344  stop = 1; /* flag to stop this procedure */
345  objects_info_left_pub.publish(Obj_info);
346  }
347  else
348  {
349  desired_hand_publisher_right.publish(DesiredHandPose);
350  stop = 1;
351  objects_info_right_pub.publish(Obj_info);
352  }
353  }
354 }
